text: Divine Liturgy of Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church at St. James' Orthodox Church in Delhi St. James' Orthodox Church at Mayur Vihar Phase-3 in Delhi, India is the first parish dedicated to St. James the Elder, in the Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church. It was established in the year 2001. ==Institutions== *St. James' Play School, Mayur Vihar Phase-3, Delhi ==References== ==External links== * Official website of St. James' Orthodox Church * Official website of Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church Category:Churches in Delhi Category:Christianity in Delhi Category:Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church dioceses
title: St. James' Orthodox Church, Delhi
